Class AwsRetryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.agnostic.client.aws.manager.AwsRetryManager

  • public class AwsRetryManager
extends Object
    Manages retrying and waiting

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AwsRetryManager.Retryable<T>
      Defines a block of code that can be retried
      static interface  AwsRetryManager.WaitCondition
      Defines a condition which can be wait on until it evaluates to true

    • Method Detail

      • run

        @RetryOnFailure(attempts=60,
                delay=5L,
                unit=SECONDS,
                types={com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException.class,com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException.class},
                ignore=com.amazonaws.services.identitymanagement.model.NoSuchEntityException.class,
                randomize=false)
public static <T> T run(AwsRetryManager.Retryable<T> retryable)
        Make up to 60 attempts to execute the given Retryable, retrying every 5 seconds if it throws an AmazonServiceException
        Parameters:
        retryable -
        Returns:

      • run2

        @RetryOnFailure(attempts=60,
                delay=5L,
                unit=SECONDS,
                types={com.amazonaws.AmazonServiceException.class,com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException.class},
                randomize=false)
public static <T> T run2(AwsRetryManager.Retryable<T> retryable)
              throws FatalException
        Make up to 60 attempts to execute the given Retryable, retrying every 5 seconds if it throws an AmazonServiceException

      • waitFor

        public static void waitFor(AwsRetryManager.WaitCondition condition,
           String errorMessage,
           int sleepMs,
           boolean extendedWait)
                    throws UnSafeOperationException
        Wait for up to 2 minutes for the given condition to be true, checking every sleepMs milliseconds. If the condition is not met after 6 minutes, an UnsafeOperationException with the given errorMessage is thrown. If extendedWait is true, the wait is extended from 2 minutes to 1 hour.
        Parameters:
        condition -
        errorMessage -
        sleepMs -
        extendedWait -
        Throws:
        UnSafeOperationException

      • waitFor
